item.title: My Little Pony Winter Fashion 3
item.description: Horses are very hungry, so you need to feed them urgently. The screen displays four animal pens, and horses will walk through them. You need to fill the bowls with food in time and throw them to the horses. At the top of the screen, the number of pets that need to be fed is displayed.
